channel.title: What is the hymen really for?
channel.description:
Apart from being a fairly unreliable status indicator of a woman's virginity (there are reports of mothers still having their hymen intact) what really is it for?
Is it useless like the appendix or does it serve a purpose?
Wikipedia doesn't even begin to explain its possible uses and I'm far too lazy to look somewhere else.
Besides, you guys are funnier.

item.description:

I honestly doubt this is the truth, and you’re both perpetuating disgusting misogynistic rumors that justify the actions of rapists and you’re fucking disgusting as human beings.

how is any of what has been said justifying rapists?

item.title: What is the hymen really for?
item.dc:creator: Lukagerm
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Oh women, why’re we so gross?

Yeah, women, why are you so gross?

SassyRobot:

Oh men, stop being so wank.

Yeah, stop bein-
Oh. Aw.
We really should.

I just looked up hymens. Bloody hell, there’s a lot of different kinds.
After all this discussion, I’m desperate for a definite answer on this. I don’t think I’ll get any sleep tonight.

Read full topic

item.description:
Fancy Pants:

i’d much rather just have a penis. all you’d have to worry about is not hitting it on anything and you’re good

But it’s the hitting part that makes it worth.

item.description:
Yes. He was. He made fun of me one time for how loud the potato chips were from me chewing them. Like I could really adjust the sound of crunching.

So when I learned he never believed he was my first, it was just icing on the cake of “Oh God what HAVE I gotten myself into?”

item.title: What is the hymen really for?
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
yeah, well i’m sure you can understand if you’ve really worked with so many rape victims that it’s a fine line between what he’s doing and attempting to justify rape.

also apparently
“The physiological purpose of the hymen is one of the eternal mysteries of women’s bodies. Although it doesn’t seem to have a specific function, it’s thought that hymen tissue remains as a vestige of vaginal development. Embryologically, it tended to keep germs and dirt out of the vagina.”

item.title: What is the hymen really for?
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
I’m aware. That doesn’t make her right.

Bolteh:

Who the fuck cares if someone on these boards got raped? It’s of no importance to my point that there is a chance that a vagina can lubricate despite the fact that the girl doesn’t want it to be.

Yes, there might be someone here that got raped, and yes that person may just come in here and say that it hurt and that her vagina didn’t lubricate, so what? Does that suddenly change the fact some other girl might have been raped and had a lubricating vagina despite her fear and unwillingness?

No idea why you’re filtering out certain parts of my reasoning just so you can have a chance to be a blabbering vagina, but I did -not- say that every rape victim was aroused or had a lubricating vagina and I did not say that rape never hurts. I did say that a girl may have a lubricating vagina in some cases and that it doesn’t always hurt if they did. But as long as you’re too thick to get that through your skull, I see no point in trying to defend my stance on this.

And you dare call me ignorant.

Oh, ok. You don’t care about rape victims. All i needed to know, thanks. And again, we were talking about generally, not a one in a fucking billion case of a girl getting her life ruined and getting aroused during it.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the hymen really for?

item.title: What is the hymen really for?
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
SassyRobot:

No, Bolteh is quite right. I’ve read about girls who’ve been raped having massive guilt issues because they’ve orgasmed during the assault, and people who’ve not been uncomfortable physically. He didn’t say that they enjoyed it on an emotional or physical level. Learn to read.

I honestly doubt this is the truth, and you’re both perpetuating disgusting misogynistic rumors that justify the actions of rapists and you’re fucking disgusting as human beings.

Read full topic
